entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
